title: Chapter 159 - Dad About to Erupt
body:
Chapter 159 - Dad About to Erupt


Ever since they discovered the situation on the Heavenly Planet, Yao Si was expecting the bloodling to take some action, but surprisingly he disappeared without a trace.


When the Alliance investigated the planets, they found several similar harvesting farms; however, unlike the one on the Heavenly Planet that was exposed, the ones found were concealed.


Ever since the news that Galactic beasts had been harvested artificially spread across the Galaxy, it turned into the hottest new topic. Galactic beasts were never considered a threat due to their distance from civilization. No one thus expected their nests to be almost within their backyards, which sent everyone on high alert. Among the many harvesting farms, there was a particular one named Mother Planet.


Within it were beasts that could easily swallow an entire planet! Even though they would be sent to the borders after being fully harvested, no one knew when the bloodling would stop transporting them out.


If the beasts were to appear in the Galaxy where the various races resided… it would be a catastrophe.


The situation caused a state of hysteria with everyone living on the edge, but despite the situation, the main culprit was nowhere to be found. The bloodlings mobilized almost all their troops to find the first generation bloodling, but it came down to nothing.


Even Mu Xuan was starting to get frustrated as he worked endlessly through the night. His face never brightened and seemed to be constantly on the brink of an eruption.


Yao Si was certain that the beasts were sent to the borders for a reason. There will probably be clues there.


“Mu Xuan.” Yao Si felt a need to remind him about it. “I want to…”


“No!” he objected before she could even ask anything.


Yao Si stilled. “I haven’t even started my question?!”


(ヾ????)


“You don’t have to. I know what you’re going to ask, and I’m not going to allow it.”


“…” Hey, what do you even know?


“Sisi.” He spoke with a solemn expression. “It’s dangerous outside. You have to be within my sight for me to feel at ease. Before everything is settled, you are not allowed to go anywhere.”


Alright, she didn’t have to go.


“Mu Xuan, I want…”


“Even thinking about it is forbidden!” His face grew stiff, his grip on her tightening. “Sisi, you’re still young. There are some things you don’t understand. Be good now, that person isn’t nice at all.”


F*ck, stop treating me as a child!


“If I can’t go, then you can!”


“No, if I go, what about you?”


“What can happen when I’m here on the Red Planet?”


His face fell. He stared at her so deeply, he seemed to be able to see her very soul. “Sisi, I feel uneasy if you leave me but for a second.”


“…” Yao Si’s heart shook, her face burning. Hurriedly, she turned her face away. F*ck, why was her heart beating so fast? Was he teasing her? He had to have been, right? When did he get so skilled at it? Wasn’t he going for the pure, innocent lover approach?


“Ahem, then… alright! We will both not go.” Steady there, I’m experienced. “This isn’t that urgent, so you can just get one of the elders to go.”


“No!” Mu Xuan’s face darkened. He seemed on the verge of explosion as he bolted upwards abruptly.


“Why?” Yao Si was startled. This was the first time he had reacted with such aggression. He was never a parent that disregarded his cub’s opinion. “Wait a minute, what exactly did you think I was going to say?”


“Regardless of what you say, I won’t allow it.” His face sank before he added resolutely, “I can agree to anything else but this! I will definitely not agree to let in that aves to meet you. No, not just here, I will not allow it anywhere else in the Galaxy as well.”


“…” Eh? Aves? Lian Yu?! When did she mention anything about her coming to the Red Planet?


Once he started, he became increasingly agitated. From a person that barely spoke ten words a day, he was now a firecracker that had gone off, nagging endlessly as he paced about the room.


“Sisi, you have to set your sights further. She is an aves and you are a bloodling. There aren’t genuine feelings between different races, but it’s easy for you to get misled due to your lack of knowledge.”


“…”


“Sisi, the aves aren’t a benevolent race. Thunder Sylvani King from the previous generation was blessed with two heavenly seeds which is considered a miracle for the royal family whose only had one heir before. It was also an opportunity for them to flourish; however, one of the heavenly seeds ended up marrying the aves queen which ended their dreams of flourishing.”


“…”


“Sisi, you are my only cub and she’s decided to direct her intentions onto you, but since you are still young, you can’t see her ill intentions.”


“…”


“Sisi, I’ve restricted the movement of all aves that want to come to the Red Planet, but she still managed to intrude several times. This shows just how cunning these aves can be.” He frowned, his jaw tightening. “Heh, I guess restricting their entrance isn’t enough. I’ll have to lock down the entire Galaxy.” The more he spoke, the more assured he became. Turning on his optical computer, he started to go through with his plans.


“…”


Yao Si was left speechless, before suddenly processing the situation.


All this while, his constipated face and the endless buzz wasn’t because of the first generation bloodling on the Heavenly Planet… but rather because of trying to keep Lian Yu from finding her on the Red Planet?


(?Д?)ノ


Where’s your bloodling ruler pride?!


“Mu-Mu Xuan…” Her brain was too small, and she needed time to process such a revelation.


“No, the Galaxy too wide, which makes it susceptible to intrusion. To ensure complete safety… I guess a war is necessary!” He found the number for all the elders.


He was about to make the order when Yao Si grabbed his hands to stop him.


“No!”


She finally found the source to the bloodlings’ horrible habit of calling for war whenever there were disputes.


Now she had finally gotten the explanation for his moodiness and sunken face in the past few days. It had seemed as though he was on his period the entire month. And she had blamed everything on the first generation bloodling.


But instead it was because of… Lian Yu?


He… had been jealous all that while?!


(￣□￣;)


For the past few weeks, he had been on the verge of an eruption, and all that was because of Lian Yu?!


The truth was too unexpected, but… it seemed kind of cute?


“No, this matter has to be resolved as soon as possible.” Mu Xuan was oblivious to Yao Si’s internal shock. He pushed her hands aside and pressed firmly onto the call button.


“Mu Xuan!” Your persona will be ruined if you continue with this fit!


With a racial war at stake, Yao Si started to panic. She reached forward to grab his face and pressing her lips against his.


Mu Xuan froze, paralyzed. She then sensed his tension going out, a red slush tainting his flawlessly white skin.


The moment he seemed to have calmed down, she lifted her fingers to explain everything word by word.


“First, I do not like Lian Yu. We aren’t even close enough to be considered friends, and this has nothing to do with her being an aves.


“Second, I am straight, so I would definitely go for a guy.


“Third, I only like you. Understood?”


“…” Mu Xuan remained frozen, unmoving.


“Hey, say something!”


“…”


“Could you react?”


“…”


“Eh? What’s wrong?”


“…”


“F*ck, why is your nose bleeding? It’s just a kiss!”


“…”
